title: The GIM Reaper

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you successfully kill a player, gain an Aura named after their faction. If you would gain an Aura that is different from one that you already have, lose the previous Aura. You may only hold 2 Aura at once. Each Aura you have increases your Attack and Defense by 1 level.
- You may select the Game itself as an attack target, and if you do so, lose all Aura at the beginning of the following Phase. The Game has Overprotective Defense. The Game will not die until it has been attacked by an attack level higher than its defense for the 3rd time. If you successfully kill the Game, it immediately ends in your victory, and no other player will be considered to have survived until the end of the game in this state.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you, or kill the Game.
